Don't trust us? Check out our free Lite version! â â âUK Driving Theory Test uses the Latest Official DSA revision question data bank in an intuitive, powerful way and is one of the most flexible applications on the market. REVISE MULTIPLE TOPICS at the same time! CHOOSE how many times you want to see the questions already answered in previous sessions! IMPORTANT NOTICE: contains the Latest Official DSA Car Driving Theory Test revision question data bank complying with a new DSA regulations as of 23rd January 2012. The main features are: ********** â Regularly updated. 2013 ready! ********** ********** â Complete. Includes ALL Latest Official DSA Revision questions and answers as well as FULL Official DSA Knowledge And Understanding Information for each question. ********** ********** â Works offline. Get as much training as you need when you need it. ********** ********** â Realistic. Try your skills in the Mock Test as many times as you wish! ********** ********** â Advertisement free! ********** ********** â Flexible ********** - Theory Test intelligently takes into account which questions have been previously answered incorrectly! - Allows practice of any number of selected topics simultaneously - NO ANNOYING REPETITION: choose how many times you want to see the questions already answered in previous sessions - Choose the number of questions you want to answer during a practice test - Full statistics with the number of questions still to be answered on the front screen ********** â The Official DSA Car Driving Theory Test revision question database ********** Over 940 UP TO DATE questions from an Official DSA Car Driving Theory Test revision question database. ALL TOPICS included. ********** â Easy to use ********** - Intuitive standardized interface allows you to focus on your test - Revise each question after test completion - Useful hints to make your car driving theory test preparation more efficient

reviews.title: Very Helpful
reviews.comment: Passed my test today in one go. However there were few questions which were not covered by this app directly/indirectly. One of them was about red and amber flashing lights on the motorway.  There are quite repetitive questions here.  Finally it doesn\'t warn me if I select only one answer instead of supposedly two.  However it helped me built my foundation and majority of the questions in my test were from here. So thank you.
reviews.author: Asima Mahmood

reviews.title: Invaluable!
reviews.comment: Passed first time,only used this training aid and one other for hazard perception-highly recomend to anyone wanting to pass first time but still practice wherever you are.
reviews.author: Steven Riggans

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Well recommend got me a pass ;)
reviews.author: Joanne Cottle

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: Ever since I\'ve had this app my knowledge of the road has improved I recommend this app for beginning drivers it\'s fantastic :)....!
reviews.author: mark roberts

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: So far so good :-)
reviews.author: Jenna Bradshaw

reviews.title: Well put together
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app that really allows you to improve your knowledge for the theory test in a  really effective manner. It comes with all possible questions and really drums into you the questions you struggle with by giving you them again and again until you consistently get them right.
reviews.author: aaron Edwards

reviews.title: Some questions not covered by the app
reviews.comment: I am pretty sure this app never used the term \"red route\" to refer to an urban clearway for instance. But I guessed the right answer by association from   Many of the questions can get very repetitive and tedious: I\'m not sure whether they should be considered differnent when the wording and order of answers is ever so slightly different: particularly when it is not verbative with what is on the test anyway.  But anyway, I found the revision I did with this app was invaluable in passing and now I hope I never have to think about Doctors\' cars with green flashing lights or whether I should offer road accident victims a cigarette ever again.
reviews.author: James Alexander Cameron

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I passed in my first go, however in the exam there were a few questions that I had never seen before
reviews.author: Sagar Patel

reviews.title: Passed first time!
reviews.comment: Used this app for 3 weeks before my theory hadnt really studied before this app was failing alot of mock tests using this app helped me pass my theory test first time with flying colours! Have already recommended to friends! Its great as u go through all the questions really prepares u well for real thing brilliant!
reviews.author: Kirsty Rhind

reviews.comment: VERY GOOD FOR TESTING YOUR KNOWLEDGE ON THEORY TEST
reviews.author: Abdul Ahad

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This app just got me through my theory single-handed. Use it, use it now!
reviews.author: Matt Malone

reviews.title: Helped me pass
reviews.comment: Passed today and this greatly helped a great app covers many areas!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Just passed with only 2 wrong. I uses this app every day for two weeks while using the cd rom a few times. Brilliant app thankyou to the makers!!! :)
reviews.author: sam wilson

reviews.title: I passed
reviews.comment: I used only this app to revise so it does the job and at a good price.
reviews.author: Jacob Foreman

reviews.title: Option to post to facebook
reviews.comment: Good app use every day at the moment till I pass
reviews.author: Rachael Bates

reviews.title: I would recommand this app to everyone
reviews.comment: This is app is the only source ov revision that i used n i passed my theory test first tym.
reviews.author: Eric Kizito

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: So pleased with it so far. I am studying for my theory test that I got tomorrow. Wish me luck yall lol.
reviews.author: Zainab Ismail

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: Passed my theory with this. Every question spot on.
reviews.author: Michal W

reviews.title: Yep
reviews.comment: Great app thanks
reviews.author: Farai King-c

reviews.comment: Passed thanks to this, remembered I had test this morning! ;)
